original_title: Ghost Ships of the Great Lakes
overview: Documentary detailing the search for the wreck of the steam vessel L.R. Doty in Lake Michigan and the subsequent search for the Lake Superior wreckage of the schooner Olive Jeanette, tied together through the story of the ship's cook, Frankie Waters.
tagline: Documentary detailing the search for the wreck of the steam vessel L.R. Doty in Lake Michigan and the subsequent search for the Lake Superior wreckage of the schooner Olive Jeanette
title: Ghost Ships of the Great Lakes
